data.description: Generator for the creation of XForms
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The goal of this module is to assist users in the creation of
    documents containg valid XForms elements.

    I think the namespace XML::XForms::Generator is appropriate in case
    someone else would like to create other modules relating to XForms,
    they can be placed under the XML::XForms namespace.
